function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor environmental quality (IEQ) variables could lead to undetected environmental hazards and poor air quality.","Impact":"Increased risk of health issues among building occupants, potential spread of airborne diseases.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and data analysis of IEQ variables to identify areas of concern and implement corrective measures.","Technologies":"IoT sensors, communication technologies, data storage and analysis tools.","People":"Building occupants, students, staff.","Owner":"Facility management, health and safety committees."},{"Description":"Lack of information about communication technologies used in building monitoring systems may lead to security vulnerabilities and data breaches.","Impact":"Potential exposure of sensitive data, risk of unauthorized access to building systems.","Mitigation":"Use of secure and encrypted communication protocols, regular security assessments and updates, adherence to data protection regulations.","Technologies":"Secure communication protocols, encryption technologies.","People":"System developers, IT security professionals.","Owner":"IT departments, data protection officers."},{"Description":"Ineffective implementation of cloud and fog computing IoT applications could lead to data integration challenges and operational inefficiencies.","Impact":"Difficulty in processing and managing large quantities of data, limitations in scalability and reusability of software applications.","Mitigation":"Careful selection and testing of cloud and fog computing technologies, development of interoperable and scalable software applications.","Technologies":"Cloud and fog computing technologies, interoperable software applications.","People":"Software developers, data engineers.","Owner":"IT departments, technology strategy teams."}]}
